images.usage: Showcase the beauty of autumn in Turkey with a focus on relaxation and warm seas.
Highlight Antalya as a key travel destination for autumn vacations.
Support the promotional content with visuals that highlight special offers.

icons.usage: Indicate special offers and discounts available for travel bookings.
Indicate special offers and discounts available for travel bookings.

assetRequirements.purpose: to capture attention with the beauty of autumn in Turkey
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant autumn colors with scenic views of Turkey
assetRequirements.content_context: showcasing the warm sea, relaxing atmosphere, and cultural elements of Turkey

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight Antalya as a key travel destination
assetRequirements.content_context: emphasizing the unique experiences available in Antalya

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осенний рай Турции — лучшие цены!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
